documents.document: Thank-You January for being a great starter to the year. It's been such an awesome month. So many good vibes. I'm so grateful.
I literally would have sung my way through class! Another amazing piece. Learning it ASAP. 👌🏾👌🏾🙌🏾 https://t.co/W4s0pK6ZiB
@PatrickGodinet That sad feeling finding out you taught to Sensitivity. Can't wait to see it fully. Ready for next week.🙌🏾 💯 @DaphneSeyb
The greatness that is Frank Sinatra.
@ToryyLane I KNOW!!!!! Seeing Octavia and Janelle crying behind her and Viola's reaction. So amazing to see all of them winning like that!🙌🏾
Seeing these three together is power beyond. All their interviews looked like fun and just to seeing them cheer eac… https://t.co/vxhjrnsuBC
This is so brilliant and deserved! The entire cast was phenomenal. The story was inspirational and the film was edu… https://t.co/JlOkRvyCGj
@carinnyaf That's why I took 2017 as a year of FB-Free. People need to wake themselves up. Just reading your Tweet got me like "BRUH".
@NellyBelly_ Yes!!! I downloaded it after watching those Undercover Lyft driver videos to find out that we ain't got none here. Smh.
Advantage to Roger. It's his serve in the next set.
Roger is so chill.
5th Set. This is about to get so crazy.
So true. To see these four play in the finals again has been everything. This Australian Open is definitely one for… https://t.co/7WPRo8Ptzq
I'm going for both of them like I went for the Williams sisters lastnight because this is such a rare game now, so im enjoying it.
All this intensity. Rafa and Roger are really putting on one great game of Tennis.
@DaphneSeyb AMEN! Been an evolution like no other but proud of EVERYTHING you have done and all that is about to hit in 2017 and the future!
This is (not surpringly) shocking and it is horrible to think that the most powerful leader in the world really signed this executive order.

This is actually what we all need!
🙌🏾 https://t.co/RboFBydVNe

Congratulations Serena!
23 and so many more to come from her this year. https://t.co/hunr769qnw
She has kept her class and sportsmanship her entire career and just seeing her enjoy this moment. Go Venus!! https://t.co/vzV9Xl0nZE
IN FORMARION! https://t.co/qayHcyE6us

Sister sister. Two trophies. History.
The Williams sisters continue to make their marks in the sporting history books.
I feel like a legit high schooler again. These finals are everything. https://t.co/hVpAr8tcPM
The Australian Open finals this year actally does feel like old times. When it was always Ser vs. Venus and Rafa vs… https://t.co/hDTEpAFZtK
IT'S TIME! https://t.co/4JLN5E8iUg
STANDING OVATION, @YazzTheGreatest @itsAlgee @whoisLukejames @WOODY_THEGREAT @KeithTPowers @elijah_kelley AND THE REST OF THE CAST AND CREW!
Their input brought so much more authenticity to the story and showcasing of it all.
I'm happy that this was made while all the New Edition members were still alive and were able to help bring their story to life.
That performance was the best way to end it all. What an amazing mini-series. The bar for biopics is at its highest now. THANK-YOU @BET!

BET 25th Reunion.
I remember watching this over and over. Go off. This has legit put me in the greatest mood. Legendary.

"I hope you see the most important thing, that you're brothers..."
This speech!

"We get older man, we get thinking about shit more.." - Mike to Ralph.
That was one of the realist lines.

That scene between Ron and Bobby.
Who hasn't had a talk like that with one of their best friends? Got me in my feels.
This is legit. https://t.co/01vQEswVx2
Wow. The things they are covering in this episode are so deep. They all went through way too much.
This scene. So deep.
I'm going to need me on those of dope as overalls. They're so cool.
All that good Soul.
They are going through all their songs.

Sensitivity.
This is my song right here.
Boyz II Men. That was a great moment. Who would have thought they would become just as legendary as their inspirations.
This song reminds me of New Years Eve. Before everyone got here, this was playing. I was vibing.

You're Not My Kind of Girl.
Come through choreo and white suits. They look so clean.
These video reenactments are fire.
RIGHT! https://t.co/kuUOZA4n59
If This Isn't Love.
New Edition Story Part Three.
Another great episode. One more to go. This miniseries is easily one of the best biopics made. Way to go BET. https://t.co/APkahFNWbm
This album is an R&B Great. https://t.co/DN81wRtnJ9
It is an anthem for friendships and relationships. Sometimes you need someone to be there to weather the storm with… https://t.co/5iDs1chP4i
This cover stands on its own next to the original. Wow these guys really bought it. Incredible. I'm jamming. This is epic.
CAN YOU STAND THE RAIN.
Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis. Icons.
That was no bueno. It doesn't matter want you do in the group, everyone plays a part in bringing it all together. B… https://t.co/3tTjFXcNMi
We have read the story over and over and this series has given the fans insight on so much.
These mothers could have their own show.
Bobby was on something else.
How are they working this hard and there really isn't nothing to show for it. Even changing managers. Still, nothing.
The soundtrack to this is amazing. If you are a fan of this era of music. You have to be singing along. Classics.
Mr. Telephone Man is a jam! Like that song will have me grooving all night.
New Edition Story Part Two.
14 years after making her first Australian Open final. Way to go Venus! This is everything. 🎾 https://t.co/AmH7ZuBLDV

Catching up on the Australian Open.
VENUS FREAKING WILLIAMS!
That was a great first episode. Shouts to the cast and crew. 👌🏾 https://t.co/nBNHVHOfdM
Not the Soul Train dancers.
Those grown up transformation. What!
They put them in such an awkward situation. I would have been fuming too. https://t.co/W1RCs2vrNV
All this style. 🙌🏾
The kids are killing this series. Yo!
Time for New Edition. Waited way too long for this story.

The only choreo to Versace on the Floor I have seen that really does the song justice. So clean and so damn smooth.
https://t.co/5goyiWX0Pc
Cannot wait!!!! 🙌🏾 https://t.co/2FYiGvCRwP
An outlet like no other.
Learning how to talk through movement. The focus, passion and love for it all. Another bomb as class. My mind is s… https://t.co/SmoXvF5Xi8
Kiko and Saia's photo. One of my favourite photos ever.
When Gabe says he don't know who New Edition are. Oh hell no.
This fettuccini salad is so tasty.
Goldan Days is by far my favourite thing in Te Papa.
Pout That L💄FE. https://t.co/ABGiS5LSr3
One of the most encouraging people I know by a long shot! 💋👌🏾 https://t.co/SyoQJ2Ykut
Braided Mafoa. https://t.co/xq9ZOCCME3
@sherridaan I know. It's actually so dang good. Each woman was so relatable and I was in awe of just how much work they put into it all!
I can't imagine a world without art. It connects us all.
Finally feeling right. This summer flu business was no bueno.
@15QueenLasela Love you all! Enjoy the next few hours and see you at the airport. ❤️❤️❤️ https://t.co/0rQxIZ9vXv
Finally got to watch Fast 7. Those last few words from Dom, the video montage, See You Again. It was all so bittersweet.
The world has progressed, yes but I wish there was a way of communicating with the past to let them know their sacrifices meant everything.
The scene about the bathroom really hit me because it's that moment of realisation that it's not just a film but that it was all real life.
Even with everything against them, they achieved so much and you already know, they worked so hard to get where they stood. I was in awe.
Hidden Figures. Now this is a piece of history and education everyone needs! Those women defied the odds and changed the game at NASA.
Moonlight is an excellent film. It paces you emotionally and just how the film was shot cinematically, it takes you on Chiron's journey.
A dangerous pair but I could share a dance-floor with them all night laughing and just going in to the fast beats o… https://t.co/GDgJCzW1Ai
Peace-in in Pink. https://t.co/leoYxkAAxh
Family Feud and fruits on the table. We won. It was so much fun. The Ngan-Woo family did that! 👌🏾 https://t.co/3nZdIFOuJs
@KayseeSavali I love that place! Especially its outdoor area furniture. It makes me so hopeful and excited to own my own house one day. 😂
The Obamas going out with so much style, grace and class. The world is truly going to miss them.
Going to sleep knowing I'll wake up to Donald Trump being the Leader of the Free World. Inauguration Day.
@15QueenLasela One last night for a while! Take care out on those streets. 🙄✌🏾️✌🏾
@15QueenLasela Are y'all okay? We literally just got to McDonald's from KB now! 😂😂
@JasmineSlade7 Yes! I can't wait for the New Edition series. I hope it outlines their solo careers because those songs are just as bomb! 👌🏾
